description: A healthier alternative to deep fried french fries that are so easy to make!
name: Crispy Baked Coconut Oil French Fries with Red Thai Curry Ketchup
recipeIngredient: Salt, to taste, I used about 3/4 teaspoon

recipeInstructions.text: Pre-heat oven to 400 degrees F. Line a large baking sheet with parchment paper (not wax paper!). If baking the fries with the red Thai curry past, whisk it together with the coconut oil.
Cut the potatoes into French fries and toss them together with the coconut oil and salt on the parchment paper.
Bake fries for 30-35 minutes, flipping once, or until cooked through and golden brown.
While fries are baking, mix together the ketchup and red Thai curry paste in a small bowl. You can make more or less of ketchup by adjusting amounts, if desired.
